description: City of Edmonton grants awarded 2010-2012 to non-for-profit  organizations in the multicultural, recreation/amateur sport and social service sectors: Community Investment Hosting and Operating grants, Community Facility Partner Capital grants, Community League Infrastructure Grants, Family and Community Support Services (FCSS) Operating Program grants.
